title: Restore previous typography, royal golden photo frame, and fix invisible navigation buttons

requirements.text: Restore the earlier (previous) site typography across all screens and ensure it is applied consistently from the first paint (no brief flash of default/system font).
acceptanceCriteria: On a hard refresh (desktop + mobile), headings and body text render in the intended (earlier) font immediately without a visible switch from a default font.
The earlier font style is applied consistently across all screens (loading, intro, cake, balloons, message screens, note, final).

requirements.text: Fix the invisible navigation button issue so all primary progression buttons (e.g., “Start the surprise”, “Pop the Balloons →”, “Next”) are visually visible and clearly distinguishable on their backgrounds while remaining clickable.

quotes: the button is not visible like which we click for next page it's working but not visible so fix it

acceptanceCriteria: On IntroScreen, the primary CTA button is clearly visible (background + label + icon) and not transparent/invisible.
On MessageScreen1 and MessageScreen2, the “Next” button is clearly visible once the card is opened.
On CakeScreen and other screens with CTA buttons, buttons remain visible with sufficient contrast in both normal and hover/active/focus states.
No button is rendered with fully transparent background/text due to missing theme CSS variables or conflicting global styles.

requirements.text: Restore the royal golden framed photo presentation on MessageScreen2 so the photo appears with the premium royal-gold frame styling as before (matching the expected “royal golden frame” look).

quotes: in 2 Screenshot the royal golden frame removed so restore it

acceptanceCriteria: On MessageScreen2, the displayed photo is wrapped in the royal gold frame styling (including the decorative border/shadow effects) rather than a plain/unframed presentation.
The frame renders correctly on mobile and desktop without layout shift or clipping.

requirements.text: Ensure the birthday theme CSS variables used by Tailwind utility classes (e.g., --birthday-pink, --birthday-purple, etc.) are defined in the active global stylesheet so theme-based classes (bg-birthday-*, text-birthday-*) render correctly on every screen.

quotes: the button is not visible... it's working but not visible

acceptanceCriteria: Theme utility classes (bg-birthday-pink, bg-birthday-purple, text-birthday-pink, text-birthday-purple) resolve to actual colors at runtime (no transparent/invalid values).
Primary CTA buttons that rely on bg-birthday-* colors render with the intended filled backgrounds on all screens.

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (shadcn/ui sources); compose/override via props/classes or add new wrapper components instead.
Do not modify immutable hook/entry paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.frontend.immutablePaths.
nonGoals: Do not change the screen flow/sequence or add new screens.
Do not add new authentication methods or third-party integrations.
Do not implement the previously mentioned photo-upload feature in this change set unless it is already in progress elsewhere.
